column8: text

PAS grassroots: Kit Siang ‘racist’, Dr M ‘robber’, Muhyiddin ‘homewrecker’Selangor PAS grassroots have made their apparent dislike of DAP, Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu) and Parti Amanah Negara (Amanah) very clear, as evidenced during an event at the party’s headquarters today.While submitting a memorandum to the PAS central committee today to urge the Islamist party to cut off ties with any party which has relations with DAP and Amanah - the grassroots members brought along with them banners showcasing the faces of top Pakatan Harapan and Bersatu leaders.One banner reads ‘Enemy of Malays/Islam (Racist) - Dr Mahathir (Mohamad) said’, with the face of DAP supremo Lim Kit Siang, and another ‘The reason my marriage was wrecked - Nika Gee’s husband said’, with Bersatu president Muhyiddin Yassin’s face.https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/373752#ixzz4Zh5M8nT6
